mentionedBy.name: Informatica
mentionedBy.notes: dbt Cloud brings software engineering best practices to analytics engineering workflow. Focuses specifically on transformation layer of modern data stack. Enables analytics engineers to work like software developers with version control, testing, and documentation built into data transformation.
